thread.title: BRIEF-Transdigm Group Reports Q1 Adjusted EPS $5.58

title: BRIEF-Transdigm Group Reports Q1 Adjusted EPS $5.58
text:
February 6, 2018 / 1:08 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Transdigm Group Reports Q1 Adjusted EPS $5.58 Reuters Staff 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Transdigm Group Inc: 
* TRANSDIGM GROUP REPORTS FISCAL 2018 FIRST QUARTER RESULTS * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.58 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $4.60 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q1 SALES ROSE 4.2 PERCENT TO $848 MILLION 
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $15.29 TO $15.93 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * SEES FY 2018 SALES $3.645 BILLION TO $3.725 BILLION 
* ‍UPWARD REVISION TO FISCAL 2018 NET INCOME AND EARNINGS PER SHARE GUIDANCE​ 
* 2018 ADJUSTED EPS ARE EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $16.95 TO $17.59 PER SHARE 
* Q1 2018 INCLUDED A PROVISIONAL NET TAX BENEFIT OF $147.1 MILLION TO RECORD ESTIMATED IMPACT OF U.S. TAX REFORM​ 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $13.59, REVENUE VIEW $3.71 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $860.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* EXCLUDING TAX IMPACT, Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.62 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
